meanings.definition: Not having or exercising authority or supervision.
meanings.sent1: The team of nonsupervisory employees worked diligently on the project.
meanings.sent2: The company hired more nonsupervisory staff to support the growing workload.
meanings.sent3: The nonsupervisory cat tried to boss around the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her painting captured the essence of a nonsupervisory world where everyone was equal.
meanings.sent5: In the land of nonsupervisory beings, cooperation and teamwork were valued above all else.

meanings.sent1: The nonsupervisory tasks were completed independently by each team member.
meanings.sent2: The project had a few nonsupervisory aspects that required individual attention.
meanings.sent3: The nonsupervisory cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a wild, nonsupervisory paradise where nature thrived on its own terms.
meanings.sent5: The artist's abstract painting depicted a nonsupervisory universe where chaos and order coexisted harmoniously.
